author: astaric
msg: Digits ²⁰⁴¹ are not in Unicode category Nd (decimal digits), and are
not matches with unicode regexp \d in Python version >=2.7. They were replaced
with ２０４１ that belog to Nd, so the test can be run on both python2.6 and
